sameAnalysis.word_list: always, often, usually, frequently, repeatedly, regularly
means: always ：总是，永远。语气最强，指在一切时候，没有例外。
often ：经常，语气弱于always,侧重动作发生的次数具有经常性，具体时间意味不强。
usually ：通常，通例地，指习惯性动作，频度仅次于always，较often大，偶尔有间隔。
frequently ：时常，经常，与often同义，可通用，但较正式，强调次数频繁。
repeatedly ：屡次，强调次数多，但反复的频率不一定均匀。
regularly ：用于修饰经常而有规律性的动作。

sentence.Network_en: A list of items is repeatedly flashed up on the screen.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个选项列表反复出现在屏幕上。

sentence.Network_en: This policy had repeatedly come under strong criticism on Capitol Hill.
sentence.Network_cn: 该政策在美国国会屡遭强烈批评。

sentence.Network_en: He developed nervous problems after people began repeatedly correcting him.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们开始不停地纠正他的错误，之后他的神经就出现了问题。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语精读单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... observe v. 观测，观察 repeatedly ad. 重复地，再三地 dunk vt. 把…浸一浸.
新大纲四级 - xieyuchao670的日志 - 网易博客 ... repeat 重复，重说，重做 repeatedly 一再，再三，多次地 repetition 重复，反复.
新编大学英语单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... recognition n. 认可；认出，认识 repeatedly a. 反复地，多次地 sculptor n. 雕塑家.
大学英语精读单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... observe v. 观测，观察 repeatedly ad. 重复地，再三地 dunk vt. 把…浸一浸.

list.abs: 警报迭... ... [omen] 先兆,预兆 [occur repeatedly;happen frequently] 多次出现;一次接着一次地发生 [alarm] 报警的通知或信号.
reliable performance 性能可靠repeatedly admired 倍受称赞reputeble all over the country享誉全国
I repeatedly encouraged Mr. Mackenzie King to keep his representive , the skilful and accomplished Mr. Dupuy , at Vichy .我一再促请麦肯齐·金把他那位干练和渊博的代表迪皮伊先生留在维希。
continual:反复，不停止(happen repeatedly) eg: continual knocks on the door反复的敲门声 continous:连续性的=unbroken(lack of i.

entry.def: If you do something repeatedly, you do it many times.

example.ex: Both men have repeatedly denied the allegations...
example.tran: 两个人都一再否认指控。

example.ex: The rebel soldiers tried repeatedly to storm the building.
example.tran: 叛军屡次尝试强攻这座建筑。

auth_sentence.content: He has repeatedly called for Mr Saleh's resignation.
auth_sentence.res_content: He has repeatedly called for Mr Saleh's resignation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has repeatedly called for Mr Saleh's resignation.

auth_sentence.content: Ira was arrested for being drunk and disorderly repeatedly.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ira was arrested for being drunk and disorderly repeatedly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ira was arrested for being drunk and disorderly repeatedly.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地

present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久

progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短+ly……地→adv.立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻

Sentence.sentence: Inkling CEO Matt Maclnnis explains that the problem with Course Smart's current digital textbooks is that they have to be revised repeatedly.
they have to be revised repeatedly

He repeatedly took an existing but half-formed idea－the mouse-driven computer, the digital music player, the smartphone, the tablet computer（平板电脑）－and showed the rest of the industry how to do it properly.

jushi.english: He pointed out the question repeatedly.
